Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on Main Street, which continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street is one of the major roads through Oceancrest. To the south, you can see the large Oceancrest Memorial Fountain. Main continues to the north where it intersects with Hillcrest Drive. To the east, you can make out the large building which houses the Clerical Order of the Rising Moon. There doesn't seem to be an entrance on this side of the building, though.
